Plot: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.
Title: Turner & Hooch
Actors: Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham, Craig T. Nelson, Reginald VelJohnson
Writer: Dennis Shryack (story), Michael Blodgett (story), Dennis Shryack (screenplay), Michael Blodgett (screenplay), Daniel Petrie Jr. (screenplay), Jim Cash (screenplay), Jack Epps Jr. (screenplay)
